description: Zoho Invoice is an online invoicing software used to create, send, and manage professional invoices, along with tracking payments and automating billing workflows.
name: zohoInvoice
title: Zoho Invoice

properties.description: Zoho Invoice error code. This will be zero for a success response and non-zero in case of an error.
properties.name: code

properties.description: Currency ID of the customer's currency.
properties.name: currency_id
properties.label: Currency ID

properties.description: Customer's shipping address to which the goods must be delivered.
properties.name: shipping_address
properties.label: Shipping Address

actions.description: Create an invoice for your customer.

properties.description: If true, create custom invoice number, if false, use auto invoice number generation.
